name: Emerson Stone
description:
Emerson Stone is an impact-focused digital agency rooted in Boulder, Colorado. We are a team of designers and engineers with years of experience creating digital products and lasting brands. Each of our projects is deeply collaborative and led by an agency partner, creating ownership, trust, and value at every stage with our clients. We exercise expertise in branding, strategy, interface design, development, user experience, and product prototyping.
Through strong relationships with both startups and global brands, we are able to create beautiful identities and effective digital solutions.
